summary: In this conversation, the customer asked the agent about Contoso Wireless' streaming product. The agent explained that the streaming service is offered for a one-time fee of $9.99 and provides access to thousands of movies and TV shows from popular networks and studios, including exclusive content. The agent also mentioned additional features such as exclusive discounts and the ability to watch on multiple devices. Finally, the customer was informed that they can sign up for the streaming service on the website or by calling customer service.
